
 Seam Validation Module

 What is it?
 ===========

The Seam Validation Module provides integration of Hibernate Validator (http://validator.hibernate.org/) 
and CDI ("Contexts and Dependency Injection for the Java (TM) EE platform") as 
defined by JSR 299 (http://jcp.org/en/jsr/detail?id=299).

 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 tbd.
